languages.text: Эвейн кажется глубоко удрученным вашим решением. Он сообщает, что не имеет права осуждать сво{mf|его|ю} спасител{mf|я|ницу}, но считает актом варварства уничтожение имперского поселения.

traits.locale_text: Эвейн кажется глубоко удрученным вашим решением. Он сообщает, что не имеет права осуждать сво{mf|его|ю} спасител{mf|я|ницу}, но считает актом варварства уничтожение имперского поселения.

languages.text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.
languages.original_text: Эвейн кажется глубоко удрученным вашим решением. Он сообщает, что не имеет права осуждать сво{mf|его|ю} спасител{mf|я|ницу}, но считает актом варварства уничтожение имперского поселения.

traits.locale_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.
Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.
Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.
Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.
Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

languages.text: 看起来，艾维尼对你的决定非常失望。他评论说，虽然他无权批判他的救命恩人，但他认为，摧毁帝国定居点是一种野蛮行为。
languages.original_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

traits.locale_text: 看起来，艾维尼对你的决定非常失望。他评论说，虽然他无权批判他的救命恩人，但他认为，摧毁帝国定居点是一种野蛮行为。

languages.text: エヴァインは、あなたの決断に心底動揺しているようだ。彼には、救世主を裁く権利はないが、帝国の入植地を破壊することは野蛮な行為だと告げる。
languages.original_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

traits.locale_text: エヴァインは、あなたの決断に心底動揺しているようだ。彼には、救世主を裁く権利はないが、帝国の入植地を破壊することは野蛮な行為だと告げる。

languages.text: Evayne parece realmente disgustado por la decisión tomada. Comenta que, aunque no tiene derecho a juzgar a su salvador{mf||a}, considera que la destrucción de un asentamiento imperial es un acto de barbarie.
languages.original_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

traits.locale_text: Evayne parece realmente disgustado por la decisión tomada. Comenta que, aunque no tiene derecho a juzgar a su salvador{mf||a}, considera que la destrucción de un asentamiento imperial es un acto de barbarie.

languages.text: Evayne wirkt aufrichtig verärgert über deine Entscheidung. Er merkt an, dass er zwar kein Recht habe, über {mf|seinen Retter|ihre Retterin} zu urteilen, er die Zerstörung einer imperialen Siedlung aber für einen Akt der Barbarei halte.
languages.original_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

traits.locale_text: Evayne wirkt aufrichtig verärgert über deine Entscheidung. Er merkt an, dass er zwar kein Recht habe, über {mf|seinen Retter|ihre Retterin} zu urteilen, er die Zerstörung einer imperialen Siedlung aber für einen Akt der Barbarei halte.

languages.text: Outré par votre décision, Evayne vous fait remarquer que, s'il n'a aucun droit de juger {mf|son sauveur|sa sauveuse}, il considère la destruction d'une colonie impériale comme un acte de barbarie.
languages.original_text: Evayne looks genuinely upset by your decision. He comments that although he has no right to judge his saviour, he considers the destruction of an Imperial settlement an act of barbarism.

traits.locale_text: Outré par votre décision, Evayne vous fait remarquer que, s'il n'a aucun droit de juger {mf|son sauveur|sa sauveuse}, il considère la destruction d'une colonie impériale comme un acte de barbarie.
